title: Pittsburgh at Night
credit_line: Gift of Barbara M. Lawson in memory of Roswell Miller, Jr.
provenance_text:
Aaron Henry Gorson [1872-1933], Pittsburgh, PA. Roswell Miller, Jr. [1894-1983], Millbrook, NY, until September 19,1983 [1]; by descent, to his daughter, Barbara M. Lawson [1925-2002], Granby, CO [2]; her gift to Museum of Art, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, in memory of Roswell Miller, Jr., October 1984.

Notes:
[1]. The painting hung in Mr. Miller's mansion "Migdale House".  See correspondence in curatorial file with his daughter, Barbara M. Lawson.
[2]. Mrs. Lawson was Andrew Carnegie's granddaughter.

creator.death_place: New York City (New York state, United States)
